attributes.action: Clear Cancelled Insurance Policies from Records after 5 Years
attributes.additional_details:
Cost of living crisis, increased cost of premiums, unfair penalisation with no end date!

This is not just an inconvenience; it significantly increases the cost of premiums for life. In contrast, criminal convictions, county court judgments (CCJs), and points on driving licenses are wiped clean from records after only five years.
attributes.background: I, like many others, have experienced the harsh consequences of having an insurance policy cancelled. Whether it's due to a policy no longer meeting our needs or a missed payment, this cancellation remains on our records indefinitely.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
